articles.title: Howard Webb to become Premier League's chief refereeing officer as Mike Riley steps down - The Telegraph
articles.description: Exclusive: Webb remains under contract in a similar role with Major League Soccer but is expected to be in post in the UK by December
articles.content: Riley said it was the right time to go with the Premier League introducing its Elite Referee Development Plan, which will revolutionise pathways for officials. A new system sees referees developed fr… [+2009 chars]
